channel.title: Distributed Computing on Enrico's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Distributed Computing on Enrico's Blog

item.title: (What was) Croquet is maybe still alive
item.description: It seems there is still some hope to see Croquet (or, OpenCobalt which took off from where Croquet stopped) alive and based on latest Squeak and more importantly using Cog VM. Matthew Fulmer reports it here. The potentials are magical as explained by Howard Stearns.
